ED_Title: Joint panel discussion of the First and Fourth Committees on possible challenges to space security and sustainability
ED_DecisionText:
At its 62nd plenary meeting, on 4 December 2017, the General Assembly took note of the report of the First Committee.

(See A/72/399, A/72/PV.62)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/72/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
